name: Flame Sword Reforger
text: If this card is sent to the GY: add this card to your hand, then if you control "Salamandra", Special Summon this card. If this card is Summoned: send 1 "Salamandra" card you control to the GY; draw 2 cards. You can only use each effect of "Flame Sword Fireshifter" once per turn.
